DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to examine whether the ear acupoint stimulation is effective on obese women.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Auricular Point Stimulation on Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: % change body weight, BMI, lipid profile, glucose and obese hormone.
DOC.criteria: Age 1665 years women BMI>27 kg/mm Signed informed consent Endocrine disease, e.g. thyroid disorder, pituitary disorder, and sex gland disorder. Heart disease, e.g. arrhythmia, heart failure, myocardial infarction, and patient with pacemaker. Allergy and Immunology disease. High aminotransferases ( Alanine, Aspartate > 80 IU/L) or high serum creatinine (> 2.5 mg/dL) Pregnant or lactating women. Childbirth within 6 months. Stroke or otherwise unable to exercise Management for weight control within 3 months. Any other conditions deemed unsuitable for trial as evaluated by the physicianincharge. Endocrine disease
